scripts.deploy:dev: nuxt generate --dotenv .env.develpment && firebase use dev && firebase deploy
scripts.install:firemodel: npm install @shisyamo4131/air-firebase-v2@latest && cd functions && npm install @shisyamo4131/air-firebase-v2@latest && cd ..
scripts.install:schemas: npm install @shisyamo4131/air-guard-v2-schemas && cd functions && npm install @shisyamo4131/air-guard-v2-schemas && cd ..
scripts.install:schemas@dev: npm install @shisyamo4131/air-guard-v2-schemas@dev && cd functions && npm install @shisyamo4131/air-guard-v2-schemas@dev && cd ..
scripts.update:adapter: npm update @shisyamo4131/air-firebase-v2-client-adapter && cd functions && npm update @shisyamo4131/air-firebase-v2-server-adapter && cd ..
scripts.update:firemodel: npm update @shisyamo4131/air-firebase-v2 && cd functions && npm update @shisyamo4131/air-firebase-v2 && cd ..
scripts.update:schemas: npm update @shisyamo4131/air-guard-v2-schemas && cd functions && npm update @shisyamo4131/air-guard-v2-schemas && cd ..
scripts.uninstall:schemas: npm uninstall @shisyamo4131/air-guard-v2-schemas && cd functions && npm uninstall @shisyamo4131/air-guard-v2-schemas && cd ..
